obj_ch2_city_noelle_monologue_slash_Step: * (Sigh...)

* Gosh, remember that night we explored the forest behind the graveyard?
* Ha, I know we never found anything interesting back there...
* I mostly remember... Crying because I was scared.
* But for some reason I feel... nostalgic thinking about it.
* Dess wiping away my tears with Azzy's jacket...
* With warm sleeves that smelled like cinnamon.
* I guess I didn't mind being scared if it meant...
* Someone would comfort me.

obj_ch2_lw_cutscenes_short_slash_Step_0_: * Well, shall we go?

* Had trouble going beddy-bye last night?

* ME TOO, KRIS!!

* Just waiting for today felt like... years!!
* Did... all that stuff really happen!?

* ... Look.
* You've been wondering the same thing, right?
* C'MON ALREADY!!!
* ... and how is Kris doing?
* Th-they're great, Tori!
* One of my favorite students. A real star!
* Oh, how wonderful!
* ... They have not been up to anything strange?
* Haha, no, they've been...
* (Can't let mom find out you're balancing a giant trash orb!)
* They're normal.

* A little concerned lately.

* Alright, Kris. This is it. Moment of truth.

* If we, uh, open this and there's nothing inside...
* Will, uh, we still be...

* Umm, S... Susie...?

* Noelle... hey...
* What... the HELL... are you doing here...?

* Here, YOU hold onto this.

* Kris, did you notice how nervous she was...?
* And like... blushing and stuff?
* Kris, you don't think... she... uh...
* She's onto our secret identities!?
* Y'know. This... Dark World stuff.
* Damn... We gotta keep this under wraps, Kris.
* This is OUR thing, y'know?
* Anyway, enough waiting already, right!?
* Let's go!

obj_event_mouse3_berdlymonologue_slash_S: (Powerless!?)
SIMPLETON?
... H-huh? Berdly?
BERDLY??? BERDLY KNOWS???
Berdly...
WHY THAT!?
* Ahh, Kris. Stuck on this puzzle, I see?
* I thought I heard Noelle calling for help, but...
* I get what that sound was now. Kris.
* Your brain must be crying.
* Poor, sweet, Noelle. Where could she be now.
* Stuck on a puzzle just like this one, no doubt.
* If only I was there to do it for her.
* She's but a powerless doe without my help...\f2
* Though being alone might be better than being with you!
* Kris, you would only get in the way!
* After all, you can't understand Noelle like I can.
* Yes, you may have been her lifelong neighbor. But.
* I am a maestro of emotional intelligence.
* I can read her feelings like a strategy guide.
* Which, I have NEVER needed by the way!
* You may see her as the simpleton girl next door.\f4
* But the reality. Is that she is.
* A lovestruck girl with her heart on her sleeve.\f5
* And... Kris... The target of her affection...
* May be surprising to you.\f6
* It's... Truly sad. Such love... May never fruit.\f7
* But still, I have to support her, Kris.
* She's my friend.\f8
* Also, my only worthy opponent at racing games.\f9
* (Is that really what you're gonna end it on!?)

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1748_0: * Thanks a lot for the lovely city.

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1786_0: * Thank you, thank you for the wonderful home! I will NOT use it!

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2138_0: * Everything here is tailored for you... right?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2143_0: * Although you only joined us for minutes, we'll miss you.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2153_0: * (He seems to be well-taken care of.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2167_0: * When are they gonna be done in there?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2177_0: * (The statue of Berdly is wedged in the toilet.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2178_0: * (You glanced back at the bathroom door sign.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2179_0: * (The sign has a silhouette of a Berdly statue.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2196_0: * I've heard it's called "The Birth of a Fountain."

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2211_0: * Where the KNIGHT creates the Fountain by its own hand...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2212_0: * Well, it's that and Cyber City's Funniest Home Videos.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2216_0: * We are often forced to star in those videos.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2225_0: * The KNIGHT created the FOUNTAIN, and this WORLD.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2226_0: * It might be even more powerful than Queen.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2241_0: * I came to support the rebels, but they aren't here.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2242_0: * ... Not really sure how I would support them, though.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2246_0: * I don't really want to eat bagels.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2255_0: * Don't look sad. You're never alone.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2263_0: * That's why I live in the trash.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2269_0: * Nuelle, eh? Not a bad name, says Nubert.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2295_0: * I was running from Queen's control plugs, and got stuck up here.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2296_0: * I'm... I'm too scared to go down the slide.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2297_0: * ... But you know what? Talking to you has increased my confidence!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2301_0: * I now have less social anxiety.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2309_0: * You came back from pretty far just to talk to me.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2311_0: * I bet I could be a hit at parties... the slide? That's not happening.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2315_0: * Now that I think about it, I don't think I could go to parties.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2316_0: * Someone might put on a slideshow...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2330_0: * Recently, something called "Internet" is having an "outage".
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2331_0: * Some say it was the secret to Queen's know-how.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2332_0: * Since then, it seems like she's become quite extreme...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2336_0: * I'm really only interested in cute digital cats.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2337_0: * I don't think the "Internet" has anything to do with that!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2344_0: * I like cats the best, but I heard "Poppup" is cute, too.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2345_0: * What? It's considered a household pest? No way...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2349_0: * Next you are gonna tell me that mice are vermin!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2361_0: * Lightners! I haven't seen many of you recently.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2362_0: * If you didn't know, an evil ruler is taking over this world.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2363_0: * I don't really like politics, so I have no opinion on this.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2367_0: * If you try to talk to me about politics,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2368_0: * We will have no choice but to cross swords...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2375_0: * Did Queen take over the world yet? I wouldn't know...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2379_0: * I'm not asking you to tell me. Actually, if you do,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2380_0: * We will have no choice but to cross swords....
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2393_0: * I heard there's a rebel team resisting Queen...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2394_0: * So far all I found are overpriced bagels...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2400_0: * Why is it round dough is always so overpriced?

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2417_0: * Cuisine is so unrefined out here in the (memory) sticks.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2426_0: * The way to the city is now open.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2427_0: * I think I'll stay in the countryside a bit longer though.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2431_0: * Everything is so naturally green here.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2432_0: * I'm charmed by the local music and flavors.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2439_0: * I really got used to the countryside.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2440_0: * Perhaps I'm just a farmboy at heart...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2444_0: * Plus, I haven't seen a single Poppup yet.

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2457_0: * But, I realized I don't really know how I would help them...

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2493_0: * Sadly, his name has been erased from the records...

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2518_0: * The day he was to be evicted from the Queen's mansion,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2519_0: * I went to his room to check on him...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2521_0: * There was only a phone hanging off the handle.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2522_0: * He must've left in the middle of a conversation,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2523_0: * Because I could still hear someone on the other end...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2525_0: * But when I put the receiver to my ear...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2526_0: * There was nothing but garbage noise.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2532_0: * Even so, he only got more and more successful.

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2535_0: * But then things started to crack.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2536_0: * It seems like whatever was helping him...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2545_0: * Suddenly, he got really good at his job.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2549_0: * We were all so jealous of him,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2550_0: * We stopped going out with him.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2551_0: * I mean, wasn't he a big shot?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2552_0: * He didn't need us anymore, did he...?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2558_0: * He started to get a little desperate.

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2560_0: * Somehow, he made the right phone call, and found someone.

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2562_0: * They must have been helping him, because suddenly,

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2569_0: * Night after night, when we all went to the same cyber grill,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2570_0: * He'd shoot his mouth about making it big someday.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2573_0: * I'm gonna be a big shot!"
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2579_0: * He was... Like the rest of us.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2579_0_b: * So I can put my favorite cartoon characters into the game.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2581_0: * For some reason, his products never seemed to hit...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2582_0: * ... and the Lightners never even looked his way.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2590_0: * I wonder what we did wrong... The forcefield is still up.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2598_0: * I'm retiring from hacking the main frame.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2599_0: * I decided to use my powers for the good of society.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2600_0: * I'm going to reverse engineer the code to Super SMashing Fighters.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2604_0: * Hacking is hard work. Whoof. I need to drink a jpeg of water.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2605_0: * (He's using the app that lets you drink water from your phone.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2612_0: * I saw you stand up to Queen! That was amazing!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2613_0: * I'll definitely become a Werewire if you can just free me!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_2619_0: * I was fishing for lost pottery in the acid when I found this photo.

* We worked on getting those together!
* What are you doing? The path is open!

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0:
* See you again...
* Or not.
* Ha ha ha ha...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_400_0:
* And this is my little Seap.
* Ha ha ha ha...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_401_0: * Over the years, I've collected odds and ends.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_402_0:
* 'Course, I've no attachment to any of it.
* It's just a hobby of mine.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_403_0:
* Around here, you learn to find ways to pass the time...
* ... or go mad like everyone else.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_411_0: * Long ago, the Darkners lived in harmony with the Lightners.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_412_0:
* They were like Gods to us.
* Our protectors.
* Our creators.
* Those who gave us purpose...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_413_0:
* Then, one day we were all locked away in this prison...
* And the Lightners never returned.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_414_0: * Embittered, the King took up arms, and aims to take revenge upon the Lightners that left us behind.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_415_0: * 'Course, even among his troops, some still distantly hope the Lightners will return...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_421_0: * Historically, this land was ruled by the Four Kings, from \cYCARD CASTLE\cW to the East.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_422_0:
* But, recently, a \cRstrange knight\cW appeared...
* And three of the kings were locked away.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_423_0: * The remaining king put him and his strange son into power.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_424_0: * This land hasn't seen THIS much chaos since...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_425_0:
* Ha ha ha...
* Well, you don't need to know about THAT.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_429_0: * He... was a funny little man. Once, the court jester. I, the court magician.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_430_0: * A friend...? Could I consider him a friend...? Perhaps, perhaps not.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_431_0: * But he was the only one who matched me in the games we used to play.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_432_0: * One day, he met a strange someone... and since then, he began to change.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_433_0: * He started saying bizarre things that didn't completely make sense -
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_434_0: * But didn't completely not make sense, either.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_435_0: * Soon, he began to see the world as a game, and everyone as its participants.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_436_0: * As the court mage, and his only companion, I was forced to lock him away...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_437_0: * Or, rather, lock US all away, in his own words.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_438_0: * Since that time, the strange words he's said have stuck inside my cotton...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_439_0: * And my view of this world has become darker, yet darker.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_440_0: * Reflecting on these old memories, I think, perhaps - I miss playing games with him.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_441_0: * And I wonder, if I hadn't been asked to lock him up...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_442_0: * Would I have found a little more purpose in my life...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_448_0:
* Ha ha ha ...
* So you are the "heroes" who are going to seal our Fountain?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_449_0:
* Ha, good luck.
* It makes no difference to me.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_450_0: * Neither Light nor Dark hold a future for a Darkner in my condition.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_460_0: * Ha ha ha, well, whether you can or not, it doesn't matter to me.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_461_0: * But here's a hint - \cYwalk where the stars don't shine\cW.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_472_0: * Eh...? What are you talking about...? A prisoner with an odd manner...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_473_0: * ... No, you couldn't possibly be talking about HIM...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_474_0:
* ... I see.
* After all the trouble I went through to lock him up, you want to release him?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_476_0: * Hmm, now that you mention it, it could be troublesome if he was left alone...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_477_0: * Yes, perhaps it's better if you Heroes dealt with him now...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_478_0: * After all, it's not as if whatever happens, will matter in the end.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_479_0: * Perhaps a little chaos might be fun.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_482_0: * (\cYBROKEN KEY A\cW was added to your \cYKEY ITEMS\cW.)
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_483_0: * If you're so driven, find the other \cYtwo\cW pieces, and get someone to \cYfix\cW them.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_484_0: * I'll even give you a hint - \cYWalk where the stars don't shine\cW.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_485_0: * Anyhow, if you succeed, come back here and tell me! Good luck!!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_486_0: * If you can call THIS luck... No, it's more like a curse...!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_494_0: * Ha ha ha... I almost wish I could watch! Tell me what happens!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_495_0: * Ha ha ha... though, I suppose if you don't come back, I'll understand, too!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_500_0: * You defeated him!? You REALLY defeated him!?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_501_0: * I see... perhaps you three may truly be "Heroes" after all...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_502_0: * But JEVIL was just a taste of what you'll face from now on.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_504_0: * You too, will begin to realize the futility of your actions.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_506_0:
* At that time, feel free to come back here.
* I'll make you tea...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_507_0: * And we can toast... to the end of the world!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_567_0: * Hmm... So we are now in the Castle Town.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_568_0: * Well, now. It makes no difference to me.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_569_0: * As long as I stay in my shop, these walls won't change.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_571_0_b: * In a way, I suppose it's just a little bit amusing to see you again.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_572_0: * I'm sure you three will have an interesting journey.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_573_0: * Me? I'll just be here offering the same old junk.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_574_0: * As you find stronger treasure, I'm sure you'll have little reason to return here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_575_0: * But if you have some time, I'll offer you a biscuit and a hint!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_582_0: * So we are here now, in a new world.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_583_0: * And right off the heels of defeating that clown... Incredible.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_584_0: * ... Oh? What's that? It seems like he gave something to you.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_585_0: * That's right... You must not have noticed it.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_586_0: * That Crystal... It's nearly invisible, but you've been holding it this whole time.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_587_0: * Here, I'll take it off your hands and appraise it.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_589_0: * Incredible! To think he had a Shadow Crystal...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_590_0: * Shadow Crystals, so called because you can only see their shadow.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_592_0: * Call it a premonition, but I get the feeling you may find more of these...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_593_0: * ... If you continue to defeat strong adversaries like \cYhim\c0, that is.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_594_0: * If you can gather more Shadow Crystals, bring them here!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_595_0: * I'm sure I can stitch together something incredible for you...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_601_0: * Well, what have we here! You managed to find another Shadow Crystal...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_601_0_b: * Ah, yes, that's right. It didn't occur to me until just now, but...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_602_0: * Oh, is that so? That salesman had found the crystal in the old machine...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_602_0_b: * You three defeated that clown last time, didn't you?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_603_0: * I wonder... if perhaps, long ago, that old machine was very important to someone.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_604_0: * A certain Lightner, perhaps... or maybe it's just a hunch. Haha!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_605_0: * At any rate, it's truly unfortunate a Darkner decided to steal that power...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_606_0: * Or, is it fortunate? Because of that, you found a new Crystal.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_607_0: * Here, let me hold onto that for you. Ha ha ha!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_619_0: * ... What is that? It appears you have a Shadow Crystal.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_621_0: * Unfortunately, I believe that you are missing one from your previous adventures.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_623_0: * But, are you sure? Are you sure you didn't defeat that clown...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_624_0: * Perhaps... You just haven't remembered that you had yet.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_625_0: * That's right, as long as you ever defeated that enemy in the past...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_638_0: * Then perhaps, even now, that Crystal might turn up somewhere close... Perhaps!~1
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_639_0: * Aha! Another Shadow Crystal! You found it...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_640_0: * The little prince has something to show you in his castle.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_640_0_b: * You can't see it, so perhaps you didn't notice...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_641_0: * Well now, are you going to turn down a royal invitation?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_641_0_b: * Didn't you defeat him? Didn't you defeat Jevil?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_642_0: * Here, I'll take that Crystal. Now, you have collected 2 of them! Huzzah!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_645_0: * If I were you, I would head home to the LIGHT WORLD.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_646_0: * Of course, I'm not you. So, I'm staying right here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_647_0: * By the by, I can't offer any advice when you're not here...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_648_0: * So I'm not sure my hints will be much use after all! Ha ha!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_654_0: * There are many fresh faces in town, I see.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_655_0: * It warms this old fluff to see such hope.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_656_0: * I was even surprised to see the Queen again.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_657_0: * Same as ever... Well, aren't we all.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_661_0: * Those young men have made an interesting shop.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_662_0: * They're leaving the bagel business, so I have the rest of their remaining stock.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_663_0: * ... By the by, it's growing late, isn't it?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_664_0: * You should hurry home once you finish your business here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_665_0: * You don't want to get caught when the sun goes down...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_674_0: * If you can defeat more strong adversaries, you may find more Shadow Crystals.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_674_0_b: * Those three young musical men are thinking about setting up a shop here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_675_0: * Try your best! It may be tough, but I'm sure it will be worth it!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_675_0_b: * I'm sure you'd appreciate having an option other than me, ha ha.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_681_0: * ... It seems that you didn't get another Shadow Crystal.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_682_0: * Hm. I understand. It's no small feat to fight an opponent that has one.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_685_0: * You're a Lightner. Don't take your life, well, lightly!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_707_0: * But don't let down your guard. I feel your next opponent may be... hm.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_708_0: * In reality, it may be impossible to win.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_709_0: * ... Unless you use the power of the Shadow Mantle.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_710_0: * Here, it may look like an old scrap of cloth, but...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_712_0: * I can't find it. Did someone... take it...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_713_0: * Hahaha! Well now, there goes your one chance of victory!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_718_0: * Unfortunately, without the Shadow Mantle, at 2 you may remain.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_719_0: * Fate is approaching... and it is not on your side.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_73_0:
* Welcome to my
shop, you
ungrateful worms.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_244_0:
That seems
to be all,
no?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_308_0:
I shall
make use
of this!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_353_0: * See thou in the Dungeon, Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_354_0: * Come by any time, my good Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_358_0: * I amst the Duke of Puzzles, Rouxls Kaard.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_359_0: * My hobbies includest calligraphy, lawkeeping, bugkeeping, cages...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_360_0: * ... and long walks in the dungeon.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_361_0: * Artest thou one of my admirers, worm?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_364_0: * By the way, no hard feelingst about earlier, right?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_371_0: * Hahaha!! So I might amasseth funds, Worms! An army of funds...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_372_0: * So that I may crushest thou like Fermented Grapes, into a most delicious and adult beverage -
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_378_0: * Haha, why of course I wouldst sell to my compatriarts, the Heroes Of Legend!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_379_0: * Earlier art but a Test of your Heroick Resolve!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_380_0: * Rouxls is ALWAYS on the winning side!! Thou can bet on that!!!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_386_0: * Our Lorde King art a cruel and terrifying Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_387_0: * However, he is also Brilliant, for he decidedesteth to appoinst ME, as Duke of Puzzles,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_388_0: * After pretty mucheth everyone else was firedst or placed inside a cage.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_392_0: * Yes, the King! A terrible Man! An awful Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_394_0: * I just envisionethed, perhaps... If I acceptedst this High Ranking Positione...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0: * I could assist to overthroweth him from the Inside!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_396_0: * ... What!? Cannot thou conceiveth of my plan?!?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_402_0: * His Son, on the other hand, is more troublesome than a fistful of fleas!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_403_0: * He alwayst asks me the Worste Queries,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_405_0: * Our relation is NONE, you little water-beetle! I placate you for your Father's sake!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_406_0: * I do not Wisheth to hear your MP3's! I would rather listen to the sweet song of Death!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_413_0: * Perhaps my wording art a bit Harshe earlier... The King's offspring is a Darling!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_415_0: * When his Father does not cook, his Son yells like a baby bird, until I feed him worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_416_0: * Is this what it means to be High Ranking!?

obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_168_:
*Don't forget to
  buy something!
\m1  If you want!
\m2  Can I buy
  something too?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_174_:
*Welcome to...
\m3  The Music Room!
\m2  We don't sell
  anything!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_532_:
*Nice town, chief.
\m1  I think we're gonna like it
  here!
\m2  Cool city.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_533_:
*As thanks, you can listen to
  all sorts of songs here.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_534_:
*Don't think it'll be cheap,
  though!
\m2  It's free.
\m3  What!?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_546_:
*I'm Sweet.
\m3  The ladies call me Cap'n!
\m2  K_K!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_547_:
*We used to work the sound in
  this town.
\m3  ... until Queen came around.
\m2  (K_K is short for Cakes.)
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_548_:
*She made music against the law.
\m2  Unless you make a song she likes.
\m3  But the only JUNK she enjoys...
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_549_:
*Are reverse diss-tracks, where
  the vocalist puts themselves
  down, and praises Queen...
\m3  Or noise music.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_550_:
*But even if Queenie tries to put
  a limiter on us...
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_551_:
*You can't STOP ! THE ! MUSIC!
\m3  Hear that!? We'll just go
  underground!!
\m2  Crash! Boom! Bang!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_552_:
*That's why we made this junk
  shop!
\m3  We'll fund our musical rebellion!
\m2  Can we make noise music, too?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_565_:
*What, wanna see what we got!?
\m3  Yo, yo, can you handle this!?
\m2  Hold onto your antennas!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_571_:
*Queen wasn't always so... harsh.
\m3  No, she WAS! She just got WORSE
  somehow!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_572_:
*It wasn't 'til that DARK FOUNTAIN
  showed up,
\m3  That she started going into
  overdrive.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_573_:
*"Knight" this, "Knight" that,
  "Fountain" that...
\m3  Like, what does that Knight
  even have going for it that I
  don't!? C'mon!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_574_:
*But like I said. She wasn't
  ALWAYS so bad. She used to
  give me sweets. For being so
  sweet!
\m3  H... huh!? I never got candy!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_575_:
*You kept calling her a
  "hot mama," Cap.
\m3  Yeah!? Is that wrong!? She
  looks like a mom and tends to
  overheat!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_576_:
*K_K! Help me out here!!
\m1  K_K! What do you think?
\m2  Huh? Me?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_578_:
*Yeah, you're right, K_K! We gotta
  focus on what's important!
\m3  If the band fights, we'll get
  outta tune!
\m2  Anyone have any lemon drops?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_584_:
*Our main gig is making scrap
  into machines.
\m3  Our clients are sometimes a
  bit off-key though.
\m2  They smell off-key too!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_585_:
*Like some... little weird guy.
\m3  He wanted us to sneak into
  Queen's mansion...
\m2  We're just rebels, we don't
  wanna get in trouble!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_586_:
*But recently we got a
  real-high-class-client.
\m3  A man of TASTE! He had a way
  with words!!
\m2  I couldn't even understand him!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_587_:
*Now, all we gotta do is follow
  the blueprints, right?
\m3  It'll be our big time break!!
\m2  Yeah!! Haha!! It's gonna break
  apart!! Big time!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_616_:
*Yo, how was that!?
\m1  Did you get rocked?!
\m2  All our songs are only 4 seconds
  long!!

obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_415:
* Please come again.
* We'll be waiting for you
with rose-tinted glasses...
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_421: * Ah, forgive me for not introducing myself sooner, young masters.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_422: * I am Swatch, Our Lady Grace's head butler.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_423: * When we are not attending to her needs, I and the Queen's other staff,
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_424: * Use this room as our humble yet colorful gift-shop-slash-cafe.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_425: * Please, shop to your heart's content. We are eager to serve your any wish.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_431: * Does a woman of Our Lady Grace's caliber not deserve -
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_432: * A coven of powerful men and women to dote upon her every movement?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_433: * To have rap anthems written to her kindness --
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_434: * Which are then bitcrushed beyond recognition to make them more 'computer'?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_435: * To have melons, smashed, with karate chops, repeatedly, for no apparent reason?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_436: * To have barrels, thrown, from the rafters --
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_437: * And make us smash them all with karate chops before the timer runs out?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_438: * But the barrels, are full of melons, and we have to smash those too?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_447: * Rouxls? I am afraid I am not familiar with a guest of that moniker...
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_448: * Ah, wait. Are you perchance referring to that unbearable -
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_449: * Err, UNIQUE Man who barged in here and demanded to be made "Butler Supremeth?"
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_450: * I am afraid that person... is now banned from this establishment.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_451: * And may have suffered injuries as a result of his, err... rather swift ejection.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_452: * Please do not mention him again.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_453: * We are still cleaning up the worms he left on the floor.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_457: * Oh, you defeated that simpleton? Wonderful, wonderful.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_458: * After he stole our flower display for one of his "boo-kettes,"
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_459: * Tasque Manager told me she saw him in the hallway,
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_460: * Where, opening with "Ah, thou muste be 50`% Likelye to be Queene",
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_461: * He thrust the vase upon her, and asked to be her "minion for life."
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_462: * ... he was promptly electrocuted to the ground.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_463: * Well. Enough of the unpleasantries. Would you like a toasted marshmallow?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_472: * Ah, my outfit. Yes, the monochrome look is quite suitable, isn't it?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_473: * Black suit, colored glasses. Many people have failed to imitate this look.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_474: * Some even going so far as to attempt to impersonate me...
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_475: * In order to get the... Oh, nevermind. Macaron?
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_480: * What? Basement? There's no basement here.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_481: * You need to relax. Have a drink, and talk softly...
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_489: * That robot was the embodiment of a Lightner's dream.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_490: * A dream I helped create... once.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_491: * Splashing color from the motion of their hand.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_492: * The Lightner filled it with their own hope, giving it an incredible power.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_493: * ... but, in the end, nothing ever came of it.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_494: * And it was left in the basement with the rest of the corrupted data.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_495: * ... But that crooked salesman! Somehow, he learned about the robot,
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_496: * And thought he could use its power to fulfill his own twisted dreams.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_497: * What a pity. To think he was once a valued customer...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_330_0: * This world is full of all kinds of people, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_331_0: * In the end, how we treat them makes all the difference.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_674_0: * ... So, why am I in here...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_675_0: * Well, they found some crap, so it's just some tests.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_701_0: * This reviewer had Mew Mew 2 as her first exposure to the series...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_702_0: * And let her tell you, it makes Mew Mew 1 look like a dumpster with sparkly cat ears!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_703_0: * With a darker storyline and more mature themes...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_704_0: * The second one treats the viewer like a real adult...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_705_0: * Instead of like an animal that will die if it goes ten seconds without seeing a beach ball.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_706_0: * Not to mention, Mew Mew's character in the first one...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_707_0: * Is more stale than the ramen I eat at home by myself with the lights off.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_708_0: * Teens and older should check out this dark masterpiece!

* Then, like, amazingly...
* You ACTUALLY got them...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1043_0: * So I told you to go back and get some french fries, too...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1045_0: * They were SO good, I ate like six!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1046_0:
* Then I like...
* Suddenly got so sick I had to go home.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1048_0:
* So, like, anyway...
* Kris, are you busy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1053_0: * Aww, that's no way to talk to your almost-sister-in-law.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1055_0: * Remember that time I played truth or dare with Azzy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1056_0: * I, like, made him give me his first kiss...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1057_0: * Then your mom found out he kissed someone, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1058_0: * Like, I think she basically dialed 911.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1059_0: * I swear your family went to church, like...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1064_0: * Aw, Krissy, you just wanted to say hi?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1065_0:
* That's adorable...
* Now get out of here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1098_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1102_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1111_0:
* HA! HA! Did I say FIFTY!?
* Well, we just went on sale!
* TWENTY! TWENTY Dark Dollars!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1138_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1142_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1151_0:
* ONE!!! ONLY ONE DOLLAR!!!
* PLEASE!!! PLEASE!!!
* I NEED THIS RIGHT NOW!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1174_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1178_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1188_0:
* Er, excuse me, Sir.
* I think I have a dollar.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1194_0:
* Heheh, perfect!
* Right this way, gentleners!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1207_0:
* I'm TP Master.
* Ask me about TP's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1215_0:
* TP? What's TP?
* That's what lets you cast SPELLS, see!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1216_0:
* When you see that orange bar,
* Cast some SPELLS when it's filled up far.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1217_0:
* TP...! It's quite a caper!
* TP! Stands for...
* ... Toilet Paper!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1219_0: * ... no, it stands for Tension Points.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1225_0:
* TP only lasts, inside a fight.
* Once you win, it's out of sight.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1226_0:
* Having extra, feels unbearable.
* No point in saving, it's straight-up terrible.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1228_0: * But leftover TP turns into extra money at the end of battle...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1230_0: * You mean I only should have been using one square!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1234_0:
* You get TP when you DEFEND.
* Protect yourself, then cast SPELLs, friend.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1235_0: * You also get TP by getting close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1236_0: * Look for the heart outline when you get close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1256_0:
* I'm Ralsei Master.
* Ask me about RALSEI's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1264_0:
* Ralsei's spell's called PACIFY.
* Use it on BABIES, before they CRY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1266_0: * What? It safely removes a "TIRED" enemy from combat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1268_0: * What if you're fighting a BABY!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1273_0: * Ralsei has a spell that HEALS, dude.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1274_0: * Why use that, when you can eat FOOD?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1276_0: * Because you won't have to use up an ITEM?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1278_0: * I could have avoided all those empty calories!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1282_0: * Ralsei loves when you give us MONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1283_0: * He will hug you, and call you HONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1286_0: * You don't need money to get me to do that!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1295_0:
* I'm Susie Master.
* Ask me about SUSIE's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1303_0:
* When KRIS uses WARNING, SUSIE can't hit.
* So make sure to -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1305_0: * So there's no reason to use it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1307_0:
* Unless...
* Unless you wanted not to hurt -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1313_0: * Susie's gone, I'm afraid, I'm afreet.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1318_0: * The days of WARNing, have long since past.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1326_0: * Susie always attacks, the foe on top.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1327_0: * She'll smash them, with a crushing chop.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1328_0: * She always strikes, at the first thing she sees...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1332_0:
* Oh no, oh no!
* She's looking at ME!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1337_0: * Will you two pick up the slack?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1342_0: * Susie's BUSTER, RUDE as may be...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1343_0: * Will deal more damage, if you just press [~1]!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1349_0:
* Susie loves, when you give us MONEY.
* She will -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1357_0: * Will you two pick up the slackts?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1361_0: * SUSIE seems to have changed, just a hair.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1362_0: * That kind of growth is actually rare.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1378_0:
* I'm Kris Master.
* Ask me about KRIS's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1386_0: * When HP goes negative, your friends fall down
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1387_0: * But bringing them back, is easy-town
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1388_0: * Plain foods and spells, work like a charm -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1389_0: * And with a MINT, you can cure all HARM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1391_0: * Even normal items and spells can revive people, huh?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1398_0: * If you only ACT, you might start to think -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1399_0: * What about the guy with the scarf in pink?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1401_0: * If you know ACTing will make the enemy friendly -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1402_0: * Then you can ask me to SPARE on the SAME TURN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1403_0: * Or, cast PACIFY if you know they'll get TIRED.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1404_0: * If you plan ahead, a lot can happen in ONE TURN!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1406_0: * Hey, who's the MASTER here, me or you!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1410_0: * It's a good idea, to give us BUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1411_0: * It'll make you happy, and fill you with LUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1412_0: * Over there, is our DONATION HOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1413_0: * We had a BOX, but it got STOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1423_0: * (If you like our tutorials, please throw your money into a hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1427_0: * (The hole is filled to the brim with cash.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1442_0: * (You failed to budget enough money to throw into a hole...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1447_0: * (You decided to save the dollar for a different hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1459_0:
* We, uh, got bored.
* So we're having a snack.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1463_0: * C'mon! All I ate for breakfast was chalk!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1467_0: * Sorry. What are you two having, exactly...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1469_0: * Just a daily treasure I hid in this stump's orifice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1473_0: * Feast for yourself, my main man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1475_0: * Kris, do you want to, um, try it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1493_0:
* It's my secret stash.
* A little snackeroo from me to you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1498_0: * C'mon, you're just pretending to eat it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1500_0: * Haha, yeah! That's what I do, too!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1508_0: * (There was a honeypot of salsa inside the stump.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1522_0: * Look, if no one else will eat it, I'll try it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1523_0:
* ... there's a jar of... Blood...?
* In here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1525_0:
* No, no.
* It's merely a pot of free-range salsa.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1527_0: * Thanks, that's actually more gross somehow.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1560_0: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1561_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1564_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1565_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1566_0: * Oh, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1575_0: * Kris, I need to grade these assignments.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1576_0: * Perhaps you should go to bed...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1577_0: * You do not look very well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1592_0: * D... Did you want to talk about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1600_0: * O-Oh, these flowers...? They're from your dad...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1601_0: * He... He always asks how you're doing in school...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1602_0: * ... Then gives me a bouquet of them.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1603_0: * ... A-actually, that he always gives me flowers...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1604_0: * ... R-really makes me w-wonder if he... If he l-likes...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1606_0: * ... The awesome comics I lent to him.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1607_0: * Honestly, HE kind of reminds me of a superhero, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1608_0: * (He's huge and could kick my ass.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1613_0: * I-It's for my kitty, MewMew! She's a perfect angel!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1614_0: * ... uh? What does she look like...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1615_0: * W... well, I've never actually s-seen her, b-but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1616_0: * Ever since I started putting out milk, it's been disappearing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1617_0: * S... So I'd like to think that there's a cat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1625_0: * K... Kris, even though you never got the chalk...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1626_0: * You deserve an award for trying so hard to find it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1627_0: * So, in return, I can let you borrow, um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1628_0: * M... My home-made DVD collection of the Symptons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1629_0: * Y-you know, the sitcom about the middle-class monster family.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1630_0: * It's got every episode in all 28 seasons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1631_0: * It's the funniest, most quotable show ever...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1632_0: * But make sure you don't watch past the second season %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1633_0: * Since they just rebooted it as Symptons Turbo %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1634_0: * They all started driving their own motor-vehicles %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1635_0: * And fighting giant giga-demons and stuff %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1636_0: * The main problem about that is that it kind of %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1637_0: * Lost the focus on family that it had earlier %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1638_0: * When their vehicles were shaped like animals %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1639_0: * And they were friends with the animal vehicles too %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1640_0: * And let's not get into Symptons Galaxy Force %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1641_0: * Where the Symptons discover another Earth %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1642_0: * On the other side of the Sun %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1645_0: * ... You don't want to watch it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1651_0: * OK, umm, if you ever need help with homework...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1652_0: * My office hours are in this disgusting alley.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1653_0: * H... Heheheh... Umm, tell your mom I said hi.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1688_0:
* (Life cannot exist without consuming.)
* (Even the moss drinks water.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1694_0:
* (The moss has been eaten.)
* (The cycle continues...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1709_0: * (The cycle ends here, in the corner of a small cell...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1745_0: * (Don't need nothin' to hold you down...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1754_0: * ... thanks for helping her, Kris. She appreciates it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1763_0: * Well, regardless of how you feel...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1764_0: * I don't think it would hurt to take a moment...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1765_0: * Close your eyes, and think about what she's doing now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1781_0: * Huh...? Kris...? Did you say something back there?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1790_0: * Well, well. I am the smith Malius. I can fix anything. Weapon, armor...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1791_0: * ... I can even fix you! Well, well, what will it be?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1813_0: * Well, well. You have nothing to fix.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1814_0: * But if you find anything BROKEN, return here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1815_0: * After all, I can fix anything...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1821_0: * Huh---! That CAKE is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1828_0: * Huh---! That CAKE is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1829_0: * ... actually, you will need a free space in your ITEMs first.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1834_0: * Huh---! That KEY is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1842_0: * Well, well. Good journey, my friends.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1846_0: * Your body is a weapon, too. You must take care of it from time to time.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1861_0:
* All proceeds go to Rudinn Relief Funds, I guess.
* It's only $40!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1878_0:
* Thanks, I guess.
* (The Choco Diamond was added to your ITEMS.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1882_0: * ... You have too many ITEMS for this, I guess.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1887_0: * You don't have enough money, I guess.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1907_0:
* (Hathy offers a Hearts Donut.)
* (Proceeds go to Hathy's Health. It costs $40.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1919_0:
* (Hathy seemed happy.)
* (The Hearts Donut was added to your ITEMS.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1923_0:
* (You didn't have enough room in your ITEMs.)
* (Hathy seemed sad.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1928_0:
* (You didn't have enough money.)
* (Hathy seemed sad.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1947_0: * May we interest you in a Lancer Cookie?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1949_0: * All proceeds go to kicking your ass.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1971_0: * (The LANCERCOOKIE was added to your ITEMs.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1975_0: * Now we may fund our illicit plans!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1985_0:
* (You bought LANCERCOOKIE.)
* (But you didn't have any room.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1986_0: * (So Lancer just dropped it on the ground and it broke.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1992_0: * Thank you anyway for your contribution...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1996_0: * Now we can fund our illicit plans!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2009_0: * What? What did you spend it on!? Pastries!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2019_0: * Hey! You can't not buy from us!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2021_0:
* Hey DUMBASS!
* It's for a GOOD CAUSE!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2034_0:
* HEY, PUNK!!!
* GET OUT OF THE ROAD!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2036_0: * ... Oh, wait, it's just Asgore's kid.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2037_0: * Sorry, I'm a little, uh, worked up lately.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2038_0:
* This job is SO boring.
* Nothing EVER happens in this town!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2039_0: * Ngh... I just wish SOMETHING would shake things up!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2040_0:
* ... Huh?
* You got somethin' to report?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2055_0:
* Who's Alphys?
* No idea who you're talking about.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2056_0: * ... Why, did they do something illegal!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2057_0: * Gotcha, if I see "Alphys," I'll tackle 'em!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2058_0:
* Fuhuhuhu!!
* They're as good as dead!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2062_0:
* What?
* There's a Dark World inside the school?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2064_0: * There's no law against Dark Worlds anyway!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2065_0: * That's a job for the school board!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2069_0: * Aww, you wanna help me? Sure, punk.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2070_0: * Get someone to rob the bank so I can suplex them!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2071_0: * ... wait, do we even have a bank?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2072_0: * Hey, get someone to build a bank...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2076_0: * Don't do anything illegal, you little punk~!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2077_0: * And lemme know if you get a lead on any purple girls.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2078_0: * There's one wanted on SEVERAL counts of Comic Mischief.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2090_0: * Wanna chat for a minute before I lose my mind?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2094_0:
* H... Hey!
* Hey little buddy!
* What's up?!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2103_0: * Do you know when Azzy's coming home?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2104_0: * Y... You can't tell him this, but I really miss the guy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2105_0: * It'd be sweet to cruise around town like old times...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2108_0: * Which, as a matter of course
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2109_0: * May not have ever actually happened.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2110_0: * B-but one time Undyne made eye contact with me!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2111_0: * ... while she was writing me a speeding ticket.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2117_0: * I can't slack off for SECONDS without hearing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2118_0: * "Be a team player, there's no I in PEZZA!"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2119_0:
* YES THERE IS.
* YOU JUST TOOK IT OUT.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2120_0:
* But it's OK, little buddy.
* I've been saving up...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2121_0: * ... To go to college where Azzy is!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2122_0: * Then I'll get a theater degree, become a famous actor...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2123_0: * And let the fangirls roll in, little buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2128_0: * Ah, yes, Little Buddy. Good idea. Meet the Rogue's Gallery.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2129_0: * Blue Ears - Soft serve obsessed, no concept of personal space.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2130_0: * Keeps accidentally pouring slushies on me and giggling.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2131_0: * The Warrior - Thankfully absent due to pizza-related injuries.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2132_0: * Constantly terrorizing customers with war chants.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2133_0: * Purple Guy - Man, THAT GUY, you gotta...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2134_0: * ... actually, does that guy even work here?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2135_0: * Ah, my co-workers. Where would I be without them?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2136_0: * A happy place, little buddy. A much happier place.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2141_0: * It's fine, Little Buddy. You don't have to watch me suffer.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2142_0: * Just enjoy your freedom... While it lasts...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2151_0:
* Kris... What a pleasant surprise to see you here.
* And on a school day.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2152_0: * There must be a reason that you came here at such a time.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2153_0:
* I, Father Alvin, implore you.
* If you have anything weighing on your mind, please, speak.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2160_0: * Kris, if you want some of our "sick" Fruit Juice, you should come to our service.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2161_0: * Our choir sounds a bit thinner since your brother went away.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6759_0: * Huh? Trying to fit your head inside? Yeah, me t-
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6760_0: * HEY!! WE DON'T HAVE TIME FOR THIS!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6771_0: * Don't try to run away, you little...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6814_0: * (... What you saw surprised you.  ... sort of.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6818_0: * (It's wallpapered with the pink cat ad from the city. It's animated, too.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6825_0: * (... Since when did Kris get so...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6827_0: * (N... no way, it's gotta be some kind of prank!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6828_0: * HAHAHA!! Kris, who's room is THIS!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6830_0: * HAHAHA!!! Man, you better hope I never meet him...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6834_0: * (You opened the door with your eyes closed. You saw nothing.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6844_0: * (You respected the Gamer's Code. No screen peeking.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6848_0: * (You can smell the glittery cat food from here anyway.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6852_0: * (You feel like Noelle would enjoy this more.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6856_0: * (You have the feeling you wouldn't learn anything.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6868_0: * (It's an advertisement for a giant ferris wheel.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6871_0: * Makes the one at the festival look like a toy, haha!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6872_0: * I... I wonder if Susie would want to...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6881_0: * Oh, so you can shake it when we reach the top?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6882_0: * Just like at the festival when we were kids?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6883_0: * I KNOW there's a catch with you, Kris! NO thanks!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6897_0: * Y-you're right! Even if I asked her, she'd...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6899_0: * And, gosh, push me to the ground, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6900_0: * L-laugh at me some more, and then...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6901_0: * (... What were we talking about again?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6908_0: * Faha, and coming from Susie Expert Kris! Thanks!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6910_0: * (Hey, Kris, how'd YOU become the Susie Expert!?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6929_0: * I mean... S-sure, if you, um... really want to!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6930_0: * You can, um, make up for when we were kids!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6938_0: * Um, it's ok, I know you can't help being a goof.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6939_0: * We ALL know you can't help it! Fahaha!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6958_0: * K-Kris, what if Noelle came in here...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6960_0: * Yeah, what if she has ticks? Get out of there!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_6971_0: * H... How should we solve it this time?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7052_0_b: * Kris? Are... you really going to leave me...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7075_0: * You... were asking ME to get it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7076_0: * Kris, c'mon, you know we can't afford that...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7094_0: * Kris, I just told you, we... we don't have the money.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7095_0: * What... what are you asking me to do...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7096_0: * You... you aren't asking me to just...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7115_0: * (I thought Kris was acting strange, but...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7116_0: * (I guess it was just another mean joke...?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7158_0: * (Faha, Kris buying ME a ring...? Yeah, right!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7176_0: * H... huh? Kris, you'd... buy it for me...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7177_0: * Sure, I guess... we could ask about it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7182_0: * Huh? S-sorry, we don't have that much money!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7183_0: * (Still, it was nice of Kris to offer...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7189_0: * Y-yeah, we don't need anything like that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7206_0: * Y-yeah, we don't need anything like that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7217_0: * K-Kris, no, I... not me, I could never...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7223_0: * Y-yeah, we don't need anything like that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7240_0: * Y-yeah, we don't need anything like that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7254_0: * (Come on, it... it was just a bad dream...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7255_0: * (Even so, it was so real, I can't get it out of my mind...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7256_0: * (... that voice, telling me what to do.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7261_0: * (Recently, there's been something... different... about them.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7263_0: * (I... I have to figure it out.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7265_0: * (Why they keep coming... to the hospital...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7274_0: * K-Kris... how long have you been standing there!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7275_0: * Phew, you... haha, you really scared me, you know?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7278_0: * (After all, a dream is just a dream, right...?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7297_0: * Why are you wearing... my watch?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7307_0: * (Then why did their voice just now... sound...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7317_0: * Hey, Kris! Let's beat it already.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7318_0: * Man, he kept telling me about Noelle, like...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7319_0: * Her favorite things, places she'd like to go...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7320_0: * No idea what the hell that was about.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7324_0: * So, uh, the hell were you two doing?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7327_0: * I was... I was just about to go home! U-umm... see you!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7327_0_b: * Kris, there's... the path is blocked, isn't it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7334_0: * Guess she's afraid of me again, huh...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7336_0: * If she knew everything that happened was real, huh, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7338_0: * C'mon, try to be a little more enthusiastic. Heh.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7339_0: * (It's a manhole. There's a ladder leading inside.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7350_0: * (It's a box filled with bagels. Take one?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7378_0: * (There aren't any bagels left in the box.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7385_0: * (You chose not to take a bagel.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7392_0: * Kris, there's lightning in the way...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7393_0: * If... if we move any further... I'll be... I'll be...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7394_0: * K... Kris, you didn't really hear what I said earlier, did you?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7462_0:
* (It's a machine that sells pre-fountain refreshments.)
* (1 bagel is $120. Buy?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7485_0: * (You didn't have enough money. Which, is surprising.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7511_0: * If you SPARE or PACIFY enough enemies of the same type, they will be RECRUITed.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7512_0: * RECRUITs will appear in your TOWN. Wonder what happens if you get them all...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7513_0: * You can check the area's RECRUIT status at SAVE POINTS. Certain BOSSES are excluded.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7519_0: * You will now have access to a STORAGE menu at SAVE POINTS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7520_0: * When you're out of space, ITEMs you find or BUY will be sent to your STORAGE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7521_0: * Feel free to put things inside you might not be able to use yet.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7527_0: * Here is a reminder of the controls. Change them in the config menu.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7529_0:
* ~1
* Cancel. Hold to RUN. Shows all text instantly.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7530_0:
* ~1
* Opens the menu. Hold down to quickly skip textboxes.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7554_0: * Oh, Kris! It's a free editable CYBERPEDIA! I'll add an entry...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7556_0: * (Ralsei wrote an article about LOSING RECRUITS. Read it?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7582_0: * From now on, defeating enemies with violence will make them LOST.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7583_0: * LOST enemies cannot become RECRUITs ever again.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7584_0: * But, the bonds you break may make you stronger...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7590_0: * (Who has time to read a book in the Cyber World?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7648_0: * (You reached inside and found something alongside a strange piece of glass...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7674_0: * Kris, want to re-read my editable CYBERPEDIA entry?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7676_0: * (Ralsei wrote an article about LOSING RECRUITS. Read it?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7685_0: * From now on, ralsay drools Susie rules

UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_1_0: No one can hear me, can they...?
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_4_0: To be honest, I'm not even sure if I can hear myself.
